message.body: Seeing how I've misread silence before, does no answer mean no?
oops, no, i never saw that text. sorry, totally would've said yes.
Glad I checked then :) So what have you been up to?
i'm on spring break, technically. still in atlanta, though. you?
Just counting down the days till break next week. You're spending break here?
do you have any plans? i'm just staying here. it's nice.
It is supposed to be nice this week. I'm heading home next Wednesday to surprise my parents for the weekend.
cute. :) they're not expecting you at all?
Nope. Going to let myself in and surprise everyone. Spur of the moment decision.
How are you keeping yourself busy over break?
